title: Such information shall be published by the Authority on its notice board/ website and also update it as and when it is updated by the concerned department
clause_text: Such information shall be published by the Authority on its notice board/ website and also update it as and when it is updated by the concerned department. Every plot / land shall have means of access like street / road irrespective of its width.
section: Authorities to Supply Complete Information about Restrictions to the Authority
